com.github.marcoshsc.orsApiTools.directions

Class DirectionsProcessingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.marcoshsc.orsApiTools.directions.DirectionsProcessingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONProcessingStrategy<DirectionsResponse>

    public class DirectionsProcessingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements JSONProcessingStrategy<DirectionsResponse>
    JSON processing strategy for Directions requests. Parses the JSON and return a java object response.
    Author:
    Marcos Henrique
